Text:
@ All - due to ISP restrictions I will not be able to UP any shows for the foreseeable future.

20-40 will try to release a Pack of CF shows (check in TV Packs [CHOOSE]) when he has a free slot. 
Please check his page regularly but PLEASE do not bother him with requests. He has a very schedule and will UP the CF shows when he can.

http://thepiratebay.org/user/twentyforty/

Thank you and sorry for the inconvenience.

Jon
